about_the_game:
This is a stand-alone game, including exploration, combat and other gameplay. Players explore ships, collect items, destroy alien monsters, and rescue aliens. The spacecraft is 1 km in diameter, with a 1 km diameter circular simulated gravity zone inside, there is plenty of room for exploration. The ship is located in low Earth orbit, and players can enjoy the scenery of space, the movement of the moon and the Earth.

Play introduction:

Press W key forward, press S key backward, press A key to move left, press D key to move right, press Shift key to sprint under mobile state. Press the space bar to jump and the F key to interact. Move the mouse to rotate the field of view.

Key features:

Explore the map and experience combat.

Game story background introduction:

in 2081, humans received a help signal from aliens, and alien spacecraft were attacked and infected by alien monsters (temporarily using cones, squares, and planes to represent alien monsters). You, the great warrior, have been entrusted by the United Nations to embark on a strange alien ship, destroy alien monsters, rescue aliens, and send them to settle in a mysterious part of the Earth. If you can destroy the remaining alien monsters, the aliens promise to give you this ship.

If you like this game, add a wish list.

name: The first contact

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7win10
  • Processor: intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7win10
  • Processor: intel Core i5-13490F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 4060ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: This is a stand-alone game. Players can freely explore different areas of the ship, collect different items, fight with alien monsters, rescue aliens, and ultimately kill all alien monsters on the ship.The ship is in low Earth orbit, and the player can enjoy the beautiful scenery of Earth and space.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
